page.title: 02POWDERHAM CASTLE
page.content: The{Earl & Countess of Devon}have lived in the castle for 50 years but the castle has been in their family for 695 years. Sir Philip Courtenay built the castle in 1390. The castle was opened to the public in 1961.They enjoy having tourists looking around the castle . The only area where tourists are not allowed is in the the park because of the 400 deer.They own a farm and the farm is a 1,000 acres.They have 10 tenants on their farms.They belong to the BHS and the BSSC.They have 2 pets 1 tortoise named Tim aged 155 and a spaniel called Peter.They say the castle is very nice to live in but expensive.There are 67 rooms and the biggest is the music room.About 35,000 tourists visit the castle a year.The most historic part is the Marble Hall.The Earl's hobbies are shooting & fishing.
